text: OMFG THIS NEW INTERFACE IS SO GOOD :heart_eyes: :heart_eyes: :heart_eyes:

elements.text: OMFG THIS NEW INTERFACE IS SO GOOD

text: Thanks I think so, too! Hopefully at some point we can also get some Plots-recipe like convenience so in simple cases you get legends and colorbars automatically. I think our focus will be more on making things possible that aren't yet before that though

elements.text: Thanks I think so, too! Hopefully at some point we can also get some Plots-recipe like convenience so in simple cases you get legends and colorbars automatically. I think our focus will be more on making things possible that aren't yet before that though

text: Yeah, that would be nice, but this is already such a huge QOL improvement, I don't feel like being greedy :laughing:
